snippet: A Marine pleaded guilty in a court-martial to urinating on the bodies of dead Taliban fighters and posing for “trophy” photos with their corpses.
abstract: Marine Staff Sgt Edward W Deptola pleads guilty in court-martial hearing to urinating on bodies of dead Taliban fighters and posing for 'trophy' photos with their corpses in one of a string of embarrassing episodes for American forces in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: A Marine pleaded guilty in a court-martial to urinating on the bodies of dead Taliban fighters and posing for “trophy” photos with their corpses.

headline.main: North Carolina: Marine Admits He Desecrated Corpses
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Marine Admits He Desecrated Corpses
